title: Patch Notes
content: a bug with the moving platform in the Gauntlet of Shar that would sometimes leave you behind, causing you to plummet to your death. The Self-Same Trial in the Gauntlet of Shar will now offer a proper challenge to those using modded classes. Fixed an error when joining a game via a friend invite on Xbox. Fixed War Magic being active before Extra Attack, forcing the player to use a bonus action before getting access to other Extra Attacks. Eldritch Knights now properly use free Extra Attacks befor
